data.description: About Vercel: Vercel gives developers the tools and cloud infrastructure to build, scale, and secure a faster, more personalized web. As the team behind v0, Next.js, and AI SDK, Vercel helps customers like Ramp, Supreme, PayPal, and Under Armour build for the AI-native web. Our mission is to enable the world to ship the best products. That starts with creating a place where everyone can do their best work. Whether you're building on our platform, supporting our customers, or shaping our story: You can just ship things.About the Role: We are looking for a Senior Manager, FP&A Systems to join our Finance team. You will lead the implementation, design, build, and maintenance of scalable financial models within our EPM platform, ensuring accuracy, efficiency, and alignment with evolving business needs. You’ll collaborate closely with cross-functional teams to integrate systems, drive insights, and support data-driven decision-making. If you’re based within a pre-determined commuting distance of one of our offices (SF, NY, London, or Berlin), the role includes in-office anchor days on Monday, Tuesday, and Friday. If you're located beyond that distance, the role is fully remote. For location-specific details, please connect with our recruiting team. What You Will Do: Lead implementation and rollout of new EPM, partnering with the Finance org and stakeholders to ensure successful delivery Design and develop complex financial models within our EPM tool to support planning, forecasting, and reporting across the business Continuously optimize existing models to improve performance, scalability, and data accuracy Partner with stakeholders across Finance, People, and Engineering to ensure models meet business needs and adapt to changing requirements Integrate models with enterprise systems to ensure seamless data flow and maintain data integrity Build and support dashboards and key metric reporting leveraging model outputs to serve end users Ensure adherence to data governance best practices and platform consistency across models About You: Bachelor’s degree in Finance, Engineering, or equivalent experience, with 7+ years working hands-on with leading EPM platforms (Pigment, Anaplan, Adaptive, Hyperion). Deep expertise in financial modeling, systems architecture, and core finance processes including budgeting, forecasting, and variance analysis. Proven experience integrating EPM solutions with broader enterprise tools and data ecosystems. Anti-bureaucratic and pro-speed, treating Finance like a product—leveraging AI tools (e.g., ChatGPT, Claude, Copilot) to automate workflows, improve data quality, and continuously ship improvements. Ensure accuracy and reliability across models and EPM outputs while leading and mentoring the team and contributing hands-on to planning system design, implementation, and optimization. Benefits: Competitive compensation package, including equity. Inclusive Healthcare Package. Learn and Grow - we provide mentorship and send you to events that help you build your network and skills. Flexible Time Off. We will provide you the gear you need to do your role, and a WFH budget for you to outfit your space as needed. The San Francisco, CA base pay range for this role is $200,000 - $250,000. Actual salary will be based on job-related skills, experience, and location. Compensation outside of San Francisco may be adjusted based on employee location. The total compensation package may include benefits, equity-based compensation, and eligibility for a company bonus or variable pay program depending on the role. Your recruiter can share more details during the hiring process. Vercel is committed to fostering and empowering an inclusive community within our organization. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, gender expression or identity, sexual orientation, national origin, citizenship, age, marital status, veteran status, disability status, or any other characteristic protected by law. Vercel encourages everyone to apply for our available positions, even if they don't necessarily check every box on the job description.
